text.autoconfig.cropmod.title: CropMod Configuration
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.modEnable: Master toggle for the entire mod. When disabled, all CropMod features are turned off and crops can be broken normally.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.requireSe: Prevents breaking crops unless you have enough seeds in your inventory to replant them. Perfect for mcMMO Herbalism auto-replant.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.cameraSna: Automatically snaps the camera to the nearest 90Â° angle when interacting with crops for easier farming.
Determines when the camera snap should occur: always when looking at crops or only when breaking crops.
Controls when camera snapping activates: always or only when you're aligned with the same row as the crop.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.itemThres: The minimum number of seeds you must have in your inventory before you can break crops of that type.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.onlyHarve: Prevents breaking crops that haven't reached full maturity, protecting your partially grown plants.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.requireHo: You must be holding a hoe (in either hand) to break any crops, preventing accidental destruction.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.showProte: Displays magical barrier particles around crops when they're protected from being broken.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.playProte: Plays sound effects when crop breaking is prevented by any protection feature.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.wheatEnab: Apply all CropMod protection features to wheat crops.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.carrotsEn: Apply all CropMod protection features to carrot crops.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.potatoesE: Apply all CropMod protection features to potato crops.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.beetroots: Apply all CropMod protection features to beetroot crops.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.netherWar: Apply all CropMod protection features to nether wart crops.
text.autoconfig.cropmod.option.cocoaEnab: Apply all CropMod protection features to cocoa bean crops.
